function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increases in NEET rates among youth, especially immigrant youth","Impact":"Negative impact on the school-to-work transition of youth, leading to unemployment or disengagement from education","Mitigation":"Provide targeted support, mentorship, and training programs for immigrant youth","Technologies":"Online mentoring platforms, e-learning tools, remote training programs","People":"Youth, especially immigrant youth","Owner":"Government, educational institutions, NGOs"},{"Description":"Disproportionately negative impact of pandemic on educational outcomes of children of immigrants","Impact":"Decreased school attendance and results, impacting the future opportunities for children of immigrants","Mitigation":"Implement targeted support programs, improve access to distance learning tools and resources","Technologies":"Remote learning platforms, online educational resources, virtual tutoring","People":"Children of immigrants, their families, educators","Owner":"Educational institutions, government, community organizations"}]}
